Module paths
Package edu.ntnu.idatt2001.paths.models.goals

Interface Goal

All Known Implementing Classes:
GoldGoal, HealthGoal, InventoryGoal, ScoreGoal
public interface Goal
The interface Goal. A goal will be fulfilled when a player has reached a certain attribute. Goal checks if the player has reached a goal.
Version:
0.1 - 11.04.2023
Author:
Helle R. and Sander S.

  • Method Details

    • isFulfilled

      boolean isFulfilled(Player player)
      Checks if a goal is fulfilled.
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      Returns:
      the boolean - true if the goal is fulfilled, false if not

    • toString

      String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Goal object. The string representation is formatted as follows: (GoalType)(GoalValue)
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of the Goal object.
